name: Epic Online Services Blocker
description:
A mod that prevents EOS from sending telemetry to Epic Games. Does so by renaming Data/Managed/com.playeveryware.eos.core.dll to com.playeveryware.eos.core_disabled.dll.
Yep, this runs in the background even if you're using the game from Steam (or anywhere).
Epic also attempts to send telemetry. Me no like telemetry
